storyInfo: Phantom, carrying out his role along with other operators, gradually integrates with the scenery of Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Landship
In some remote corner...
Clearing foreign matter, closing wounds, wiping the blood away.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: This is what little I can do.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: For finer treatment, you'll need the aid of a professional doctor from the Medical Department.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: ...This will be enough.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Where will you go?
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Back to where I belong.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: To where you belong...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: You mean to say... all alone, by yourself?
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: W-Won't you go celebrate with your team? You've all been on such an important mission this time, and their spirits are so high, and you could surely be together...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: I need not.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: In times of celebration, there need not be me. Under the midday sun, there need not be shadow.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Perhaps the one who ought to join the celebrations is you.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: That... I can't...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: As you see fit.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: ...I should be taking my leave.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: —Hold it!
I finally found you, Operator Phantom!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Dr. Whisperain, were you tending to his wounds just now?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Ah... yes...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Though you may not formally be on the Medical Department's roster of doctors, I still have a responsibility to remind you.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: According to the 'Regulations for Management and Treatment of Rhodes Island Wounded Personnel,' all wounded Operators must undergo registration at the Rhodes Island Medical Department.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: When people treat Operators' wounds in private like you have, we can put the little cuts and illnesses aside, but on the off-chance any complications arise in Operator Phantom's condition or from his wounds owing to your incomplete care, that creates a headache for the Medical Department.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I'm so sorry...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: The one who asked Miss Whisperain for treatment was I.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: There is no need to blame her.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: I'm just telling her the facts.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: As for you, Operator Phantom, you're the bigger problem here!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Why didn't you report to the Medical Department following your injuries?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: If Blue Poison hadn't been on the same mission and she hadn't informed me about you during treatment, would you have just taken your pain all the way into the next battle?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: This is irresponsible to the company, and irresponsible to yourself.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I hope you can recognize that.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: The fault is mine.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: I deeply apologize to you, dear doctor.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Right. I accept your apology.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Now, I need to issue you diagnosis and treatment, along with a full check on your state of health. No problem?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Don't give me that look. Hold on! Mouth shut! Don't make a sound! You're not using your Arts to slip out of here!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I'm not letting last time repeat itself. If I notice anything even slightly fishy, there's a pushbutton alarm here and I WILL immediately sound it!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Was there always such a button on the wall...?
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Just relax. There'll be no corridors. I'm not taking you to the Medical Department.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Blue Poison's told me you don't like places with a lot of people.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: So I've brought all the equipment here.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I'll help you collect and sort out your treatment information, and then I'll treat your wounds for you with Dr. Whisperain.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: No problem, Dr. Whisperain?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: By all means.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Will that be okay, then, Operator Phantom?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Sigh...
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: (Silent nod)
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Good. Then I'll begin your diagnosis and treatment immediately.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: If possible, could you describe for me the rough location and nature of your wounds?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Why aren't you talking?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: (Points at sealed lips)
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: I believe it's because you told him 'mouth shut' just prior, Folinic.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: (Rolls eyes)
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You can talk now. Please go ahead.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: A crossbow bolt piercing the shoulder, a blade slashed across the palm, ice binding both feet.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Shoulder, perforation wound; injury to hand caused by sharp weapon; hypothermia...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: No effect observed in right leg, but lower left leg appears not fully recovered.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Right, let's deal with these one by one.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Shoulder perforation wound.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I closed the wound just prior. There should be no jeopardy.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Hm... If it was just an ordinary metal bolt, then we're good.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Did you debride?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Already sorted.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Judging from the healing of the wound, there should be no possibility of poisoning or infection.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Right. Next item.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Laceration to the palm.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Hm. Seems to be healing well.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: However, with two separate wounds, we have a substantially higher risk of infection, so in a moment, I'll give you a prophylactic injection. That should solve that worry.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Finally, frostbite on the left lower leg.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Okay, alright. Stay like that, don't move. I brought the detection apparatus just for this.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: This might hurt a little. Hold your breath.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Sample collected.
Beginning analysis—
Good.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Once the numbers come out, I can give final diagnostic conclusions.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Any other discomfort or injuries anywhere?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: (Hm?)
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: (Ms. Christine? You seem to have something in your mouth...)
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: —Are you listening to me?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Mm. No, no other injuries.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Your recuperative capacity truly is outstanding, Operator Phantom.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Maybe I really have been overly concerned.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Operator Phan—Rather, Phantom, you're a specialist operator, aren't you?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: So they call me.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: But your mix of wounds is more numerous than I've seen on vanguard or defender operators.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I've heard your mission this time was extremely difficult.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: 'It's lucky we had him supporting us. We wouldn't have come back alive otherwise.' I've already heard from plenty of others to that effect.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But most of them don't know your codename, and have never even seen your form. They only know the shadow flashing across the battlefield helped them out.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: They have nothing to gain from remembering me.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Sick of hearing that. All the operators I've treated before love stressing that one.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Let's drop that. Cut down on chatter. Most of the us here aren't that naive, or maybe one day we're all going to go our separate ways. Hell, imagine if one day we all end up meeting on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But Phantom, and I may be meddling... I feel I need to tell you that, at least right now, they just want to express their gratitude, nothing more.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Some words you might never have another chance to tell someone, if you don't tell them when you can.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: (Quietly) ...Don't be a goddamned idiot like me, choking everything down inside.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Blue Poison told me you blocked a crossbow bolt for her.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: She wanted to thank you, but couldn't find you, so entrusted me with bringing these things here.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: This brooch is a present from her to you. Please, take it.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: This...
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Just take it.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Many thanks.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: I will relay my gratitude to her.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Analysis complete
Now outputting analysis report
Mm...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: That's not reassuring.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Mr. Phantom, can you try and move for me?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: (A slightly uncoordinated walk)
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Right. That'll be fine. You can sit down for now.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Presumably frostbite from hypothermic temperatures caused by Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Not severe, but it's already affected your mobility.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Just some small injuries.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Please leave distinguishing minor injuries to the professional opinion of a medic, thank you.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You'd best convalesce for now.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: That would be my opinion.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: I agree with Dr. Whisperain's view.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: It might be frostbite on the surface, but it's still essentially fine Arts damage.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We aren't optimistic about your Oripathy infection in the first place. We all need to do our best to avoid any situation that could worsen its progression.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Ample rest, a healthy diet, and appropriate restorative exercise. These are what you need right now.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Of course, the most important thing is that you regularly come to the Medical Department for treatment.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Your treatment course won't be too long. Just one month, and you'll be able to take part in missions again.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: If you don't like the idea of coming to the Medical Department, I can help set up rounds for you to lessen your contact with others.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: If you consent, then please sign at the end of this statement.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: (Another sigh)
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: (Signs his own codename)
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Good. Thank you for cooperating.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Now I should give you your injection.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: This is a new model of syringe. It won't leave too much of an ache.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Please hold your arm out.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: (Uses syringe)
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Right. With that, initial prophylactic treatment is a success.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I have a meeting this afternoon, so I won't bother either of you any further.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You're on vacation for a month, so live it up, Phantom.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: See you.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: She's gone now.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Phew... It seems I'm still not quite used to talking with Folinic. I always get so nervous...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Are you alright?
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Fine, more or less.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Meow.
attributes.name: Ms. Christine

attributes.content: Ms. Christine.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: (She rubs against Phantom.)
attributes.name: Ms. Christine

attributes.content: Don't, now.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: I'd like for you to rest well on your coming vacation.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Vacation?
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: I've never thought about it before. Vacation. What should I do...?
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Erm, perhaps... see a movie?
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: If I were in your shoes, I might go and see one. And then I'd make a record of how I felt all the while.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: During them, I always end up fantasizing for myself a life like the people in the pictures, and at the same time, in a contradictory way, I can feel how I truly breathe, outside of the screen...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Take care.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Fantasizing of living another's life is no good thing.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: I understand. It's just that, it's a habit of mine, a way to relax.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: And moreover... it's a little embarrassing to admit, but it seems as though there are some operators who very much like to read the things I end up writing...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: I don't personally believe I write all that well, but if it's enough for everyone to enjoy, then I feel it might not be so bad this way.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Meow—
attributes.name: Ms. Christine

attributes.content: Ms. Christine?
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: That tickles. Don't you... hm? What is this?
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: If I had to guess, she might want you to take a look at this leaflet.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: 'Wanted: Multiple staff members for a Multimedia Escape Experience event—'
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: 'Staff required to take charge in planning escape rooms in whole, for an urgent and pressing adventurous atmosphere.'
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: 'Staff required to plan deciphering and mechanisms within escape rooms.'
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: 'Staff required to—'
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: '—act out roles.'
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: 'Design (until opening) to last one month. Salaried for the duration, with three meals a day included.'
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: 'Interested operators and staff aboard, please find details at the Human Resources Department.'
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Multimedia escape experience...
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: I've heard it's a new manner of entertainment, one that emphasizes stimulating the senses and immersive experiences.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: It seems as though... most escape experiences are themed to rely principally on elements of terror and suspense.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: I'd seen one, some time before. Its theme was an underground labyrinth in Minos.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Truthfully, I wanted very much to give it a try.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: But that day, the A1 Detachment's Operators told me after experiencing it themselves—
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: 'It scared me to death!'
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Yet, while they told me that, they seemed to be so happy.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: (Fear, but with joy?)
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: (Hm... Enjoying being frightened?)
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: I didn't dare go back then, and now that I think of it, maybe I regret that a little...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Perhaps, this time, I can. Er, should I ask Weedy to come with me?
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Ms. Christine, were you hoping for me to see this?
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Meow!
attributes.name: Ms. Christine

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: I believe I understand what you mean.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: You're leaving, now? So, have you decided on where to go for your vacation?
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Just some concept of it.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: If the right amount of fear can serve to bring others merriment.
attributes.name: Phantom

attributes.content: Perhaps... I can give it a try.
attributes.name: Phantom
